Exaggerate: The claim does not seem to exaggerate any information or make any extreme statements.
Lack enough support: The claim does not provide any evidence or support for its statement.
Problematic assumption: The claim does not make any assumptions.
Exist alternative explanation: The claim does not provide any alternative explanations.
Contradict fact: The claim does not contradict any known facts.
Falters at times: The claim does not falter or waver in its statement.
Understate: The claim does not understate any information.
